chapter.code-block: template< std::forward_iterator Iter, std::predicate<std::iter_value_t<Iter>> Pred > Iter skip_if_front(Iter begin, Iter end, Pred pred);
chapter.p: Skips all leading elements that match the given predicate and returns new begin iterator.

chapter.code-block: template< std::bidirectional_iterator Iter, std::predicate<std::iter_value_t<Iter>> Pred > Iter skip_if_back(Iter begin, Iter end, Pred pred);
chapter.p: Skips all trailing elements that match the given predicate and returns new end iterator.
